comment.author: 39191857@N05
comment._content: Wow!  She looks very pretty as a bride is meant to be but that smile is fabulous.  Lovely shot of the young lady.  Is there any catalogue or way of knowing who she might be???

comment.author: 94517803@N04
comment._content: Thanks for your sharing! The Great Image Group

comment.author: 54403180@N04
comment._content: Unfortunately not, swordscookie, although we do hope to go over to the Strabane/Lifford area in coming months and carry out some public outreach work there (where the photographer, Herbert Cooper had his studio)  to try put names to some of these faces.
comment.authorname: Public Record Office of Northern Ireland
